screeningSummary: Prank caller claiming Bigfoot behind 7-Eleven - reveals friend in gorilla suit

textVariants.text: You're on the air. What's your story?
Alright, you're on. What's your story?
YOU ARE ON THE AIR! Tell us your story!
You're on. What's this about?
You're on. So?
Oh good, a caller! What's your story?
You're on. State your experience concisely.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Okay, so this is gonna sound crazy, but my buddy dared me and I've had three beers and... look, I saw Bigfoot behind the 7-Eleven last Tuesday. Right behind the dumpsters.

textVariants.text: Behind the convenience store. Doing what exactly?
Behind the 7-Eleven... okay, doing what?
BEHIND THE 7-ELEVEN?! This is AMAZING! Doing what?!
Behind the convenience store. Let me guess - it was eating a hot dog?
Behind the 7-Eleven. Fine, what was it doing?
BEHIND THE DUMPSTERS! I love this already! What was it DOING?!
Behind the convenience store. Describe the observed behavior and any distinctive characteristics.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Just... standing there. Huge, hairy, looking right at me. Made eye contact, Vern. Then it walked into the parking lot.

textVariants.text: And?
...and?
AND?! This is INCREDIBLE!
And? Let me guess - it drove away in a Honda?
And?
AND?! What happened next?!
Subsequent actions and trajectory.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Got in a Honda Civic. My buddy Derek. He had this gorilla suit he'd been saving for Halloween. I can't believe I actually called about this.

textVariants.text: Probably buying beef jerky. Next caller.
Right... Derek's gorilla suit. Next.
DEREK in a GORILLA SUIT buying BEEF JERKY! This is the BEST call of the night!
Of course it was Derek. Next caller.
Honda Civic and a gorilla suit. Next.
DEREK IN A GORILLA SUIT! I can't believe you called about this but I LOVE it! NEXT!
Convenience store procurement of snacks. Classic bigfoot behavior. Next caller.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: *snorts* Okay you got me, great show though Vern. I'm never living this down.

arcNotes: Prank call, reveals it's a friend in a gorilla suit, self-aware humor
